documents.document:
Busy month

It has been quite sometime since i last blogged. Many things have happened - good and bad - since it's all past, I shall not mentioned the bad ones.. hahaha~~

As for good: I make a few new friends - one whom I can look for when I'm happy or down. I also know who are my true friends are... Went drinking most of the time during mid May. Went KL with my Car Club frds... Full of Events. Beautiful memory, which happened in that period, shall live in my heart.

I will be very busy from now till end June... got 3 weddings and a new biz proposal to handle. One wedding gonna to be very rush... it's only less than a mth for me to assist them, nevertheless, will make things go smoothly and well planned. Moreover my overseas couple will be coming for 4 days. I'm seriously tied up with work and alook at my schedule, it's fully packed from back to back.

Perhaps, It's time for me to handle stress and to test my capabilities as well... Oppos.. not forgetting as a diet plan for me.. wahaha~~


Well, all weddings will go through as planned. Only hope that I can secure the biz proposal by this Friday. Wish myself all the best in clinching the big deal.

Off to work soon....

1 June 07

Well... A friend of mine told me that my blog is too short.. seems like I got nothing much to write... Haha~~ (Hope you get to read this when you are back ) Is not that I got nothing to write lah... just that no time to write it... everyday is a different experience for me.. sure got something to write about.. wahaha... Perhaps my blog is nothing interesting..

Anyway, just finished some work for tomorrow. Really tired.. has been out for the whole day with my overseas couple. *Yawnz* After some tgt, is not really a diet period for me.. keep having 2 meals a day - one in the morning, another in the late evening.. What a broad gap! Oh.. Something interesting happened - got a summon for over-time. Sob sob... well, come to think of it, at least not the max. fine.

OK, for now! I will update any happenings for 2nd June when I have the time.
Got to sleep now... still have some work to complete and appointment tomorrow. Another busy day for me...

Good nite everyone. Sweet Dreamz~

2nd June

Wow... look at the time... Hmmm... finally I got an enjoyable night...

Had a busy day as usual. Woke up pretty early this morning.. All my aunts turned up at my house today to prepare the dumplings.. Had to help out here and there and to entertain relatives from Malaysia as well.. Kind of busy where I have to prepare my documents for the appt later in the evening. Shag.... Well, the dumplings smell and taste nice... however, somehow i felt a little too oily.. hehe~~ Anyway, thanks for all the efforts - mum and aunts.

Had a merry go round when going for my appt in the evening... Suppose to go to Simei after sending my 3rd aunt to tampines. Got the wrong exit and ended up making a very big round... moreover, I can't find the place in the street directory.. gosh~~ Think I should get an updated one. Nevertheless, I learnt a new route today.

oh ya... enjoyable nite.. I just come back from KTV Pub - finally i can relax and enjoy myself once again. Get to play quite a no. of rounds for the pool... hehe~~ Guess it was just my luck. Thanks guys for the drink, btw.

Hmm.. What's on my mind now?? It's all nothing but work - fully planned schedule for tomolo - Yes! It's Sunday but not a rest day for me ya... I still got some work to do but... hehehe~~ think I shall complete them tomolo before I go off for my appt.

So now... Shoo~~~ Off to bed! Time to Sleep, have a good dream and wake up early later. Oh ya... hope tomolo can heng heng - strike 4D.

3 June

Hmm... Was looking at the time stated on my past blogs.. Kinda of "Sala" leh... How to change it to s'pore time huh? Hmmm....

There are a few thoughts on my mind now.. (Paused... Watching tv first.).... To Be Continue....

Back already... was watching the channel 8 12am show... about the Netherworld. Pretty nice actually...

Anyway, my thoughts.......

Mostly about work - kinda stress over several issues - which led to unstable emotion.... Well.. weak handling over EQ. Hahaha~~ (Will try to improve this)

Am organizing a BBQ for my car club friends on 9 June... However, the responds from my color wasn't good - kind of disappointed - although I know that such things will happen through years of being organizer. Wahaha~~ Anyway, not a big issue also.. just that it shall be the last time for me to organize such event.

Oh no... i really dislike the commercial of Gasby (hope I got the spelling correct). Think be'cos of the song they had.

Back here... Of cos that's not all... however, I shall keep some in my heart. In short, I want to get the big deal asap.. Will minus one concern from the list.

8 June will be handling a wedding. Bless me that everything will flow smooth as planned. *Good Luck To Yvonne! JiaYou!!*

A Quote for all of you:

"Tomorrow is another day"

So make full use of your day and live with no regrets.

Time to sleep... long day tomorrow - work from 11am to 8+pm.... Go! Go! Go!

Sign off
Von

5 June

Didn't write any blog for the past 2 days.. was too busy and tired to write any... Has yet have my dinner.. oppos.. it's becoming supper.. Guess I shall just drink a milk will do.

I'm rather stoned now... just staring at the screen with my mind blank. I better don't stay up too late tonight as I still have to get an urgent job done by tomorrow morning.

In fact, there are afew urgent work to be done.. haha.. has to really prioritize to the level of "urgency".

Come to think of it... my blog is all about work and work.. must be bored you guys out there.. haha~~ Sorry.. cos' all this while, I'm doing nothing but just work. Workaholic?? Hmm.. maybe? Perhaps? Not really actually.. just that I got no choice... haha~~ However, these are the things that happens during these few days... so, please bear with it...

Anyway, will try to write something interesting - meaning that I have spiced up my life inorder to write... Will try to ya...

Nite~ Sign off~

Eventful Days...

Wow... It has been a few days since the last blog was written.

Hmm.... pretty interesting during these few days....

A wedding just over. A sms from the Groom - "Clear the Carpark! My convoy is existing SLE!" Hahaha~~~ Funny groom, interesting "Sisters" and "Brothers". However, Brothers not so sporting leh..... purposely dragged time so that don't have to be "Sabo" too long... hahaha~~ Something more interesting... Half way through the Tea-Ceremony, Summon auntie came. All those brothers rushed down to put coupons.. Some manage to put, some can't make it in time (and That's me! ) Was quite angry cos that Malay Aunite said it's too late. I already keyed in when I just managed to appeared in front of her.... Can't they just do something good - giving us extra time - knowing that there is an blissful event going on? haiz.... for the sake of commission... become so heartless. Anyway, the groom was very kind enough to settle the summons for us... wahahaha.... Thanks, Jason!

Everything went perfectly. 95% of the guests came on time at 8.15pm; The timing for the March Ins were perfect; Solemnization; the montage and highlight screening was good. I'm very satisfied with the entire flow. Another success wedding that I have done!

Know what! After the wedding dinner, most of their friends go down to their pub to celebrate. I went down too.. haha.. so happening~~ Well, saw a no. of TPs on the road, but lucky, they didn't drive home. Haha~~ Was tired but enjoyable.

Now, left with 1 more couple to do. Tomorrow is their ROM and customary 2 weeks away from now. Hmm... this couple is hard to handle in a way that they engaged me to help them but never want to listen, wanna act on their own - end up making confusion and procastinating... Headache Anyway, I just want to make sure that every goes well and no hip-ups along the way - So far, all the weddings I handled turned out good and nice.

Hmm... oh ya.. went for a BBQ on Sat evening. I was one of the organizers - was tired cos the pervious night was the wedding; then got a deal to make on sat morning; then head down to buy all the BBQ stuffs... Really knocked out after that. Phew~
Well, at least turned out fun and busying BBQing.. hahaha~~ And now, I got abit heaty. Gums abit swollen and pain! So pityful...............

All the 3-day events - that's why "Eventful Days".

Weather is rather hot and humid since last week. Got to bath so many times... Unbearable.... To remind all: please drink alot of water. Me too. keke...

What's happening!!

Wonder what's happening......... things ain't going fine for me...

Summary:

Friday (15 June 07)

It's all started here... Carrying my laptop and stuffs happily walking down to my car... who knows!
1. Car was driven out - no car to drive to Rasa Sentosa,

2. Realised that my wallet was in the car - so ended up with no cash with me, had to walk to the Mcd, with heavy stuffs, where my cousin was waiting for me (suppose to pick her up there)

3. Was having breakfast, almost done with my cup of tea, heavy downpour! Ended up got to call for cab - extra money and effort spent!

4. On the cab towards expressway, struck in a traffic jam. Too occupied with those unpleasant events earlier on, forgotten to ask the driver not to travel by Expressway. Too late, afterall.

Well, in the end, spent quite alot on the cabfare which I could have top up my car to the max.

5. On top of this. Regarding my service provider - No biz enthics, principles and integrity - Supposingly agreed on the cut to my company; agreeing on his service much earlier. In the end, he can't make it and referred another friend of his to replace him (I am okay with that since he has yet meet up with my couple - by right it shouldn't be in this case where you already agreed to provide your service to my couple - but I accommodate him)and now claimed that nothing has been agreed on (I even email him those corresponds to him for verification on this issue); his friend don't give any cut and still suggested that I should t/f in full. I shall not give him any deal in future. That will be the end of our collaboration. Really upset and angry with these kind of people.

Someone suggested that I should just give them the balance, dont' take the cut, and forget about it. Isn't it allowing them to bully me and at a losing end? Haiz~~ Just becos of the $75.00. Funny right?

Well.......... was going to genting to witness the Guiness 9 Ball tour in the evening.

Tgt everything should be fine.... Haha~~ Guess what! So decide to try my luck - if it was proven that I'm down of luck - Tried 3 times in the casino and really can't make it. Haha~~ and sorry for the man whom I placed my bet on top of his... haha~~ Then decided to go and sleep. Try again next day~

Sat (16 June 07)

Nothing happen today. Hmm.... the only good thing is that being able to be on live on ESPN. haha~~ Can see me there with my team mates. Woohoo~~ Catch me in there if you can. haha~~
Well, did try my luck again... but really no luck again. Haha~~
Anyway, overall is an average trip, at least take some time off from work. Was back at about 3.30am... so shag~

Today - Sun (17 June 07)

Hmm... slept for almost whole day... so long didn't sleep like that already.. haha

Everything went on fine... Until I received a msg from my sis that something happened to the car......... My bro just banged onto a taxi while doing a reverse parking at my blk carpark. I just saw how bad the damage was... think he must be in a fast speed....

Bringing my car to the "clinic" tomorrow. Haiz~ And almost all guys have an ego. Still have to urgue with me when I tell my bro what we should do in this case - in terms of the insurance issue. Haiz~~

Heartache!

Forever Friends

It's great to meet up with my old old friends. We are a bunch of friends - starting off knowing each other when I first joined Mcdonalds in 1994. That's was my partime job since Sec 2 till Sec 5.
And yes! 1994 till 2007. It's has been 13 Years of friendship and we still keep in touch with one another. Of cos, some of them are already out of MCD, however, some are still in the big family; some of them already married with kids; some married; some single; and of cos some attached. Wahaha.....

Friends are hard to come by; memories will be forever remain in our mind so long we shall live.
It was really filled with great, fun, happening, crazy and lovely memories, not forgetting, some unhappiness as well. Those were the days~~ Nevertheless, all these were over and all of us stil make the effort to meetup once in awhile despite our hectic work schedule and personal commitments. It's all about how each of us see in this friendship.

Really nice to know all of you. And by chances or the fate that brought us together, we must treasure this long long r/s. I shall see you guys again in the Chalet in Sept 07. Hurray~~

Yours sincerely,
Von

Take a breathe~~

Woohoo~~~~ Finally I'm able to have room for breathing... after weeks of hard work, rushing and hectic schedule.

Not my luck though... my couple's bride car striked 2nd prize and I didn't place bet on it.. haiz... most of their families and relatives won out of it.. So many couples that I have handled, so far, none of their nos. came out... this time, I didn't buy and it opened.. haha~~

Another event went on smoothly... Really happy for them and congrats.

Anyway... I can focus on other projects now... haha~~

Looking forward to 22 Aug 2007. Hehe~~ So called "Holiday Time".

Pool Clinic

Wow.. yesterday was an interesting day for me as well as our other members in Poolfanatic.com ... We get to see and in contact with the World 8 Ball & 9 Ball Champion, Ronnie. Some of them also managed to get to play with him for a game each.

Hmmm Took some pictures of it.. however, can't upload in the blog itself... Hmm.....

Anyway, play MJ last night till this morning.. sad to say.... haha... lost! I only have 3 hrs of sleep and was been disturbed by my cousins... Now I can't get back to sleep... *Yawn*

First Mark

Hmm... I'm pretty new to this. Just got to know abt this when a frd forwarded it to me. Well, this gonna be my blog from now on.

For those who has bypassed my blog, hope you have enjoy your stay here...

Happy Birthday!

Happy Belated Birthday To Myself~~ 1. I want to be successful in life and biz. 2. To find the Mr. Right. Hahaha~~ 3. My family and friends to be healthy and happy. May all my wishes come true...

Hmm... Enjoyed myself alot.. Went for dinner, received a watch as a gift, went Mt. Faber... It has been a long time since I felt like a princess on my day.

Greatly appreciated.

New Life

It's already 2 days after my day...
Had alot of thoughts.. Has been too lagging for the past 1yr 5mths due to...... From now no, I must stand up and get my life back which I have lost. I must be whom I used to be - to fight for my dreams and goals. I will be grateful if people around me be supportive.

Jia You, Von!

Jia You, everyone as well...!!

Mood swing??

Hmm... it has been a long time since I have a mood swing.. what happened to me? is it becos need an attention at this stage? Or need to improve on human communication skill? Or becos not feeling too well that caused it to happen? Well, perhaps I'm demanding.... Give and take will be fine... but don't take things for granted. heehee~~

Sick~~

Down with cough and sore throat... First, my dad... followed by me.. and now, I lost my voice... I sounded like a man... Yuckz.. haha~~

Anyway, take this opportunity to have a goooodddd..... rest! Heehee~~

I will recover soon...

Sepang~~

Quite alot to update... haha~~

Well, just come back from Sepang - One-day Vios Make Track Day 2007 - Organize by a group of Vogsters.

Indeed an interesting event and experience for me.. Although did not drive my car in.. (still new.. can't bear to do it ), I sit in 4 cars and quite exciting and learnt abit here and there... If possible, will drive my car one day...

Feeling very tired now... lack of sleep and use alot of energy as well as alot of sun-tanning today.. haha~~

Well, did enjoy myself. Hope there will be more of these kind of events.

Last but not least, I'm almost recover from my cough... hurray~~ Go go go... go away...

Unexpected Gift

Finally got a new wallet from my old time frd cum sis... so unexpected.. heehee~~

Thank you so much...

PG Nite

What an experience! So exciting... saw alot of fast cars.... furthermore, I went down trying the kick. Although not driving my own car down to track, still a good experience and lesson learnt. Hmm...got to try harder to get the most perfect launching... heehee~~ Will go down with my own car for future PG Nite again....

Check this out!

A new update for the Sepang Track Day... Something to share with the people ard me..

http://halcyondigital.net/20070430vogstvcm/index.htm

More pictures to come... Enjoy ya..
